rooms.description: A welcoming space with ample natural light, aligned to the east according to Vastu for prosperity.
Spacious living area with an open-plan design. Includes a decorative Bohemian element with eclectic furniture and textures.
Functional kitchen placed in the southeast as per Vastu guidelines for energy flow, featuring modern yet earthy decor.
Adjacent to the kitchen with a Bohemian accent. Large windows to let in natural light from the east.

openings.description: A robust door ensuring security and energy flow per Vastu principles.
Provides access to an expansive balcony overlooking the front yard.

rooms.description: Bohemian themed bedroom with a private balcony overlooking the garden. Placed in the northeast for positive energy.
Adjacent bedroom to Bedroom 1. Each features individualized Bohemian decor and a private balcony.
Third bedroom with access to its own balcony for fresh air and natural light, aligned to the north.

openings.description: Main staircase connecting ground and first floor with sufficient headroom.
Direct access to the private balcony.

rooms.description: Bohemian styled bedroom with a balcony offering scenic views and natural light, positioned in the northwest.
A serene bedroom with Bohemian accents. Access to its own private balcony.
Cozy study area integrated within the floor plan ensuring a quiet work environment with adequate natural light from the west.

openings.description: Main staircase connecting first and second floor.
Provides access to a private balcony with scenic views.
